nodes.bodyText: This is just a name change, not new code.
Any idea why git didn't pick up on the rename?
It's because there was an interface called MsgPackWriter before, in the same package, which was renamed and moved to Writer in the package above.
Tis a shame that these annotations can't be added when targeting Java 7.
This doesn't seem as easy to follow as parameterized spock.

If I understand the code correctly, the Context is used to serialize out the current struct or array so that it's possible to write the length in bytes in the varint encoding in the parent buffer before copying over the serialized bytes from the context. It would be great with some comment about the machinery so it would be easier to follow without digging through the call chain.
Yes, that's right. As you can see, it's quite awkward to write protobuf. I will try to explain the mechanics better in comments.
